text.textblock: Also Beginning at Lower Neches River Corridor unit angle point no. 39; Thence, along the common line between the Lower Neches River Corridor unit and the Village Creek Corridor unit the following 2 courses: 1. S. 51
E., 1594.97 feet to angle point no. 40; 2. S. 08
W., 2053.48 feet to angle point no. 41; Thence, N. 41
E., 1450 feet, along the North line of said A-14; Thence, Southerly, approximately 3000 feet, along the southerly gradient boundary of Village Creek; Thence, S. 37
W., 850 feet, along the common line between the Lower Neches River Corridor unit and the Village Creek unit, to the Point of Beginning.
Part of said A-53 described as follows: Beginning at Lower Neches River Corridor unit angle point no. 38; Thence, S. 86
W., 2500 feet; Thence, Northwesterly, approximately 19,500 feet, along the northerly gradient boundary of Village Creek; Thence, N. 03
E., 1200 feet, to the Point of Beginning.
Also Beginning on the South line of said A-53 at a point which lies S. 86
W., 2600 feet from angle point no. 38 of the Lower Neches River Corridor unit; Thence, S. 86
W., 1862.70 feet; Thence, Southeasterly, approximately 19,500 feet, along the southerly gradient boundary of Village Creek, to the Point of Beginning.
Part of A-39 described as follows: Beginning on the North line of said A-39 at a point which lies N. 86
E., 1150 feet from the Northwest corner of A-39; Thence, N. 86
E., 700 feet; Thence, Southerly, approximately 15,000 feet, along the westerly gradient boundary of Village Creek; Thence, along the northerly right-of-way line of said U.S. Highway 96, S. 44
W., 200 feet; Thence, leaving said highway right-of-way line S. 86
W., 1450 feet, along the South line of said A-39; Thence, N. 02
W. 800 feet, to the Point of Beginning.
Also Beginning on the North line of said A-39 at a point which lies N. 86
E., 2000 feet, from the Northwest corner of A-39; Thence, N. 86
W., 650 feet, along the northerly right-of-way line of U.S. Highway 96; Thence, Northerly, approximately 15,000 feet along the easterly gradient boundary of Village Creek, to the Point of Beginning.
